files.name: Ilastik CPU (Windows)
files.description: Installs Ilastik for Windows. Please note that this version of Ilastik is not GPU-accelerated.

files.description: Installs Ilastik for Linux. Please note that this version of Ilastik is not GPU-accelerated.

files.name: Ilastik CPU (macOS)
files.description: Installs Ilastik for macOS. Please note that this version of Ilastik is not GPU-accelerated.
